reviewText:
This Div 2 football game was played in Pittsburg, KS.  The Pitt State Gorillas were playing at home.  There is no "H" in Pittsburg KS or Pittsburg State University.  The NCAA knows this so is this really a product of the NCAA?  Or is CreateSpace (part of the Amazon.com group of companies, enables Amazon.com to offer music and video content that might not otherwise be available) the ones responsible for this irresponsible typo?

The game that day was a great small college football game.  The Colorado Mines quarterback was very good.
